mapper.select: select r.*,p.positionName,p.positionId,d.departmentName,d.departmentId,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,s.WORK_STATUS from staff_reinstatement r left join position p on r.positionId=p.positionId left join department d on r.departmentId=d.departmentId left join staff_info s on r.staff_id=s.staff_id where s.WORK_STATUS=1 order by r.REINSTATEMENT_ID asc
